title: Apigee - Support for Apigee Integration
abstract:
# Apigee - Support for Apigee Integration
**Announcement:** Application Integration is now available for your Google Cloud project. You can now use both Apigee Integration and Application Integration within the same Google Cloud project. [Learn more](/apigee/docs/api-platform/integration/using-application-integration)
content:
## Get support from Google
### Discuss Apigee Integration
Use the [Apigee Integration](https://groups.google.com/d/forum/api-integration) Google group to discuss Apigee Integration and to receive Apigee Integration preview announcements and updates.
## Provide feedback
### Provide documentation feedback
If you run into issues while using the documentation, have general feedback, or want to make a suggestion, use the documentation feedback mechanism. From any page in the Apigee Integration documentation, click the **Send feedback** link at the top or bottom of the page to open a feedback form. Your comments will be reviewed by the Apigee Integration team.
